text: This is a list of notable European companies. For further information on the types of business entities in this union and their abbreviations, see "Business entities in the European Union". ==By Revenue== The following is a list of 27 largest European Union companies 2015, ordered by revenue in millions of US dollars. {| class="wikitable sortable" !
